findings.title: QSP-1 Incorrect Staking Logic
findings.description: The users staked amount at epoch X will not allow them any reward at epoch Y if X < Y , meaning that their staked LP tokens are not accumulated when computing the rewards for each epoch.

findings.title: QSP-2 Gas Intensive Loop Usage
findings.description: If a user stakes at epoch X and claims his reward at epoch Y using BasePool.unstakeAndClaim or BasePool.claim, and if Y is higher enough than X, transactions will most likely throw due to running out of gas or will hit the block gas limit.

findings.title: QSP-3 Incorrect Series 2 Reward
findings.description: Total rewards between epochs 85 and 336 is almost doubled of what it should be.

findings.title: QSP-4 Total Reward Adjustment
findings.description: In `totalRewardsInEpoch`, L88-92 adjusts `totalRewards` using a logic that is not currently documented and therefore could not be validated. As such, its effect is currently undetermined.

findings.title: QSP-5 Undistributed Epoch Zero Reward
findings.description: Epoch zero reward will never be distributed since `BasePool.stake` will be allowed to execute only after `starttime` where `starttime` is equal to `HEARTBEATSTARTTIME`. In the opposite `_currentEpoch` will return zero only if the block timestamp is lower than `HEARTBEATSTARTTIME`.

findings.title: QSP-6 starttime Value Is Inconsistent With Specification
findings.description: The start time in the code is inconsistent with the specification, set to 1602288000 (2020-10-10 00:00:00 UTC +00:00) instead of December 4th, 2020.

findings.title: QSP-7 Staking Manipulation
findings.description: A user staking right before the end of an epoch will still be able to get the reward for the ongoing reward even if he staked for only one block.

findings.title: QSP-8 Input Validation
findings.description: The address parameters received as input parameters do not have any sanity checks.

findings.title: QSP-9 Incorrect Reward Per Stake
findings.description: When updating `cachedRewardPerStake` in `updateRewards` modifier, the calculated value might be wrong due to incorrect consideration of different series intervals.
